thread.section_title: Yahoo! Finance: Property Management Industry News
thread.title: Forest City to participate in panel discussion at Evercore ISI 2015 Real Estate Conference
thread.title_full: Forest City to participate in panel discussion at Evercore ISI 2015 Real Estate Conference - Yahoo Finance

author: Forest City Enterprises, Inc.
title: Forest City to participate in panel discussion at Evercore ISI 2015 Real Estate Conference
text:
CLEVELAND , Oct. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Forest City Enterprises, Inc., (NYSE:FCEA and FCEB) today announced that President and Chief Executive Officer David J. LaRue will participate in a panel discussion titled "Real estate development - What's the appropriate size of the pipeline at this point in the cycle?" at the Evercore ISI 2015 Real Estate Conference. 
The panel discussion is scheduled for Thursday, October 8, 2015, at 1:50 p.m. Eastern time. A live webcast of the panel discussion is available at the following link: 
http://www.veracast.com/webcasts/isi/realestate2015/13111192553.cfm 
About Forest City 
Forest City Enterprises, Inc. is an NYSE-listed national real estate company with $10.3 billion in consolidated assets. The company is principally engaged in the ownership, development, management and acquisition of commercial and residential real estate throughout the United States. For more information, visit www.forestcity.net . 
View photo
. Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20080515/FRSTCTYLOGO
